description:
net: renamings
This is Go 1 package renaming CL #3.
This one merely moves the source; the import strings will be
changed after the next weekly release.
This one moves pieces into net.

http -> net/http
http/cgi -> net/http/cgi
http/fcgi -> net/http/fcgi
http/pprof -> net/http/pprof
http/httptest -> net/http/httptest
mail -> net/mail
rpc -> net/rpc
rpc/jsonrpc -> net/rpc/jsonrpc
smtp -> net/smtp
url -> net/url

Also remove rand (now math/rand) from NOTEST - it has a test.

The only edits are in Makefiles and deps.bash.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f5b1cf2c3320 ***

net: renamings
This is Go 1 package renaming CL #3.
This one merely moves the source; the import strings will be
changed after the next weekly release.
This one moves pieces into net.

http -> net/http
http/cgi -> net/http/cgi
http/fcgi -> net/http/fcgi
http/pprof -> net/http/pprof
http/httptest -> net/http/httptest
mail -> net/mail
rpc -> net/rpc
rpc/jsonrpc -> net/rpc/jsonrpc
smtp -> net/smtp
url -> net/url

Also remove rand (now math/rand) from NOTEST - it has a test.

The only edits are in Makefiles and deps.bash.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5335048

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Thu, Nov 3, 2011 at 1:04 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> net: renamings
> This is Go 1 package renaming CL #3.
> This one merely moves the source; the import strings will be
> changed after the next weekly release.
> This one moves pieces into net.
>
> http -> net/http
> http/cgi -> net/http/cgi
> http/fcgi -> net/http/fcgi
> http/pprof -> net/http/pprof
> http/httptest -> net/http/httptest
> mail -> net/mail
> rpc -> net/rpc
> rpc/jsonrpc -> net/rpc/jsonrpc
> smtp -> net/smtp
> url -> net/rpc
>
> Also remove rand (now math/rand) from NOTEST - it has a test.
>
> The only edits are in Makefiles and deps.bash.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5335048/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5335048/>
>
